person.persName: John N. Layne (Boyd County, KY, resident)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Married to Mary Honaker Layne in Pike County, Kentucky, on October 10, 1842. Father of Sarah P. Layne, James M. Layne, and Joseph C. Layne. Carpenter in Pike County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.
